name: Seedot
author: Miki Tanaka
flavor_text: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, if Seedot would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack’s damage done to Seedot if that damage is 40 or less.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.effect: Choose 1 card from your opponent’s hand without looking. Look at that card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.
